scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Descent of the Holy Spirit, with the Virgin Mary seated centrally, reading a book, surrounded by the Apostles. Above them, a window frames a dove, representing the Holy Spirit, emanating fiery rays. The figures are gathered within an architectural setting that suggests an upper room or a hall, with arched windows and decorative elements visible in the background. The composition emphasizes the divine inspiration received by the assembled group.
